analysis.statement: Require role-specific training for high risk roles, including at least roles with privileged access

checks.description: Verify privileged role assignments and training requirements
checks.request: az ad privileged-access list --query '[].{RoleName:roleDefinition.displayName, UserName:subject.displayName, State:state, AssignmentType:assignmentType}' --output json

checks.description: Verify conditional access for privileged users training compliance
checks.request: az ad policy list --query '[?contains(definition.displayName, `Privileged`) && contains(definition.displayName, `Training`)].{Name:definition.displayName, State:definition.state, Conditions:definition.conditions}' --output json

checks.description: Verify role-specific training curriculum and tracking
checks.response: Documentation review required to verify role-specific training curriculum, completion tracking for high-risk roles, and specialized security training requirements

checks.description: Verify privileged access training governance and compliance monitoring
checks.response: Documentation review required to verify privileged access training governance, compliance monitoring procedures, and remediation for non-compliant privileged users
